about-text.en:
I'm a brazilian developer interested in technologies focused on web, backend, and mobile development. I have practical knowledge in languages such as JavaScript, TypeScript, Python, C, C# and Java, as well as HTML and CSS for building interfaces.

I have worked with frameworks and libraries like React, React Native, Vue.js, Next.js, jQuery and Bootstrap. In backend development, I have experience with Node.js, NestJS, .NET and ASP.NET, in addition to using Prisma as an ORM for database integration.
